thread.section_title: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® | custombuttons.com
thread.title: Lisa W
thread.title_full: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® reviewed by Lisa W

author: Lisa W
title: Lisa W
text: I was really happy with the service and quality of the buttons we ordered. It took less than 10 minutes to place my order and the buttons arrived two days later!! I will use Everyone Loves Buttons again if I ever need any of their services. Great Company!
